reviewText:
This listing is very misleading. The total length of the DVD is only 60 minutes! There are a number of 4 family film compilations out there and this on "appeared" to be one with "the Letter Writer" on it. (great movie BTW)

BUT... When you look at the back of the case (which cannot be seen in the listing) you find out that these are like long trailers, or cutting room footage??? I don't know, but I'm guessing that 90%+ of people interested will think that this has 4 feature length films on it and IT DOES NOT.
